nodes.text: The Imperial Knights quarters were located on the planet of Bastion and included a practice room where members of the Imperial Knights could spar with one another. In approximately 137 ABY, a sparring match occurred in the practice room between the Imperial Knights Ganner Krieg and Azlyn Rae under the direction of Master Treis Sinde. It was observed by several other members of the order, including Roan Fel, Emperor of the Empire-in-exile that the Imperial Knights served.
The Imperial Knights quarters appeared in the forty-third issue of the comic-book series Star Wars: Legacy, written by John Ostrander, penciled by Jan Duursema, and published on December 23, 2009.
